item.title: Partial GraphQL models with pydantic
item.description: I was recently building a client for a GraphQL service in python and was faced with the problem of modeling the message types. Since those are essentially json models, I turned to pydantic with which I had good experience in the past. Although in theory this should be relatively simple, I encountered some annoying problems right off the bat. Lets take trevorblades’ country info GraphQL API for example.
